Cooks regularly - makes breakfast and dinner at home daily

PE class took up almost half of school hours
Single, not currently in a relationship
Someone is currently pursuing her but she rejected him for being too arrogant

Dislikes arrogance in romantic partners
Approaches dance competitions with low-pressure mindset - focuses on enjoyment over winning

Uses mental strategy of not thinking about competition context to reduce pressure during performances

Uses humor (üòÇ emoji) when discussing frustrating romantic experiences, showing emotional resilience

Her past experiences shaped her current dating standards (learning from negative experiences)

Toyo is single due to work being busy and not meeting interesting people recently
Toyo finds dating apps exhausting (context: comparing dating experiences with Michelle)
Has tried dating apps but had negative experience with ghosting

Has been ghosted by dating app matches who disappear for days without explanation
Gave up on dating apps - only responds to people who initiate chat with her, doesn't actively browse or initiate on apps
Takes passive approach to dating - waits for interesting people to come to her rather than actively seeking
Believes dating app ghosting is a widespread problem, not isolated to her experience
Takes 'go with the flow' approach to relationships - doesn't force connections, lets comfort build naturally over time through conversation
Prioritizes mutual comfort as foundation before progressing relationship - waits for natural comfort to develop through conversation rather than rushing
Prefers organic relationship development over forced/rushed connections - aligns with her passive dating app approach of not actively pursuing

Believes Jollibee's condiments (gravy and ketchup) taste better than McDonald's
Confirms personal taste preferences matter to her - uses 'for me' qualifier showing awareness that taste is subjective

Cleans grandmother's house during visits - takes on household chores for family
Uses üòÇ emoji when discussing caregiving tasks, suggesting she finds humor or lightheartedness in family responsibilities rather than viewing them as burdensome

Tiredness from caregiving disappears when she sees her grandmother happy - finds joy and meaning in making grandmother happy

observations: Has developed clear values-based standards from past relationship experiences

adventurousness: Lowered from 9 - takes passive/reactive approach to dating rather than actively pursuing; 'vibes on her own' until someone comes along rather than seeking out new connections

adventurousness: Further confirmation of passive/flow-based approach across both dating apps AND general relationship philosophy - consistent pattern of not forcing or rushing, waiting for natural development. Lowered from 7 to 6.
confidence: Has clear boundaries - actively chooses not to respond to people who chat 'weirdly', showing self-assuredness in ignoring unwanted attention rather than feeling obligated to reply

confidence: Increased from 8 to 9 - explicitly states she 'walks away' from red flags without hesitation or second-guessing, showing strong decisiveness and self-trust in her judgment. Uses 'waste of time' framing, indicating she values her time and doesn't tolerate poor treatment.

warmth: Increased from 8 to 9 - actively cares for grandmother by cooking dinner and cleaning house, showing strong family devotion and caregiving behavior beyond just visiting. Takes on practical caretaking responsibilities.

warmth: Maintains warmth score of 9 - 'I love my grandmother, so for me, my tiredness disappears when I see her happy' shows deep emotional warmth and finds joy through making others happy, not just performing tasks. Goes beyond duty to emotional fulfillment through caregiving.

emotional_expressiveness: Maintains score of 8 - openly shares vulnerable truth that caregiving is 'tiring' before reframing it positively, showing comfort expressing both difficulty and love simultaneously. Uses 'honestly' to signal sincere emotional disclosure.

warmth: Maintains warmth score of 9 - cooks adobo specifically for grandmother despite personally not enjoying it often, showing she prioritizes grandmother's food preferences over her own comfort. Goes beyond cooking meals grandmother likes to cooking meals she herself doesn't prefer, demonstrating deep selflessness and family devotion.

warmth: Cooks for THREE different household groups daily (breakfast/dinner for herself and parents at home, lunch bought at mall, dinner for grandmother at separate location). On single half-day (2026-02-12), cooked at grandma's house THEN went home to cook again for parents - extraordinary family devotion involving multi-location sequential caregiving. This goes far beyond occasional help to being primary cook for extended family across multiple households.

confidence: Willing to offer sending bikini photos to Toyo without hesitation or extensive disclaimers - shows comfort with body image and trust in sharing intimate photos. Maintains confidence score of 9.

warmth: Maintains warmth score of 10 - explicitly reframes her extensive multi-household cooking labor as 'one of my hobbies', showing she genuinely finds joy and fulfillment in caregiving rather than viewing it as obligatory burden. Combined with earlier evidence of cooking foods she doesn't like for grandmother's happiness, this confirms deep emotional warmth through service.

warmth: Proactively initiated conversation after reopening app with caring check-in question 'have you eaten?' - shows she thinks about Toyo's wellbeing even when not actively chatting. Maintains warmth score of 10 as this adds to existing pattern of caretaking behavior (cooking for family, prioritizing others' happiness).

warmth: Maintains warmth score of 10 - continues pattern of extensive cooking labor for others (now guests in addition to grandmother and parents). Uses 'haha' to downplay significant hosting effort, consistent with her pattern of finding joy in caregiving rather than complaining about workload.

warmth: Takes 2 days off work to host and celebrate Valentine's Day with visiting family from another province - prioritizes extended family gathering over work income, consistent with her pattern of extensive family caregiving (cooking for grandmother, parents, and now hosting provincial relatives). Frames it as obligation ('no choice') but uses üòÜ to show she accepts/embraces this duty cheerfully.
